articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Champions Trophy: Joe Root hits a century as England beat Bangladesh
articles.description: Joe Root makes an unbeaten 133 and Alex Hales hits 95 as England cruise to an eight-wicket win over Bangladesh in their Champions Trophy opener.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: French Open 2017: Andy Murray fights back to reach Roland Garros third round
articles.description: World number one Andy Murray and British number two Kyle Edmund reach the third round of the French Open.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Yaya Toure: Manchester City midfielder signs new contract
articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure has signed a new one-year deal with the Premier League club.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: French Open: Can Andre Agassi bring back 'warrior' Novak Djokovic?
articles.description: Will the addition of 'super coach' Andre Agassi be enough to bring back the "warrior" in Novak Djokovic?

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England v Bangladesh: Ben Stokes sledging leads to confrontation with Tamim Iqbal
articles.description: England's Ben Stokes and Bangladesh's Tamim Iqbal exchange words during the opening match of the Champions Trophy at The Oval.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Chelsea paid £150.8m by Premier League after winning 2016-17 title
articles.description: Chelsea were paid £150.8m by the Premier League after winning the 2016-17 title - 50% more than last season's top earners.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Champions League final: Is Gareth Bale finished at Real Madrid?
articles.description: A change of formation, competition for places, injuries and a lukewarm press - why it is tougher than ever for Gareth Bale at the Bernabeu.

articles.title: Ulster v Barbarians
articles.description: Live video coverage of Ulster against Barbarians from the Kingspan Stadium, Belfast.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Mr Met's 'inappropriate gesture' and the #CrazySocks4Docs initiative
articles.description: Find out what's buzzing in the social media world today.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Nordea Masters: Max Orrin shares lead with Jamie Donaldson and Bradley Dredge one behind
articles.description: England's Max Orrin shares the lead with Italy's Renato Paratore after the opening round at the Nordea Masters in Malmo.
